root.name: Goosebumps: Escape from Horrorland
root.description: Escape from Horrorland is a classic puzzle/adventure game from Dreamworks Interactive which was released in 1996 on 2 CD-Roms. The game melded live action video with rendered backgrounds. The plot follows three adolescents and the player, in their attempts to free their parents and Escape From Horrorland. The gameplay was generally a point and click adventure, but also contained real time cutscene events, and a first person maze sequence. The game contains multiple endings. A live action character in Escape From Horrorland.
